hero.title: Learn Physics with AI
hero.description: TermoPhysics is an innovative AI-powered platform that transforms complex physics concepts into interactive learning experiences with visual illustrations and personalized explanations.

features.title: Why TermoPhysics?
features.aiDesc: Get instant explanations for any physics concept with advanced AI technology that adapts to your learning style.
features.visualDesc: Generate custom visual representations of physics concepts using our state-of-the-art image generation technology.
features.pathDesc: Save your conversations and track your learning progress with our integrated chat history system.

about.title: About TermoPhysics
about.desc1: TermoPhysics was founded with a mission to revolutionize physics education through artificial intelligence and interactive visualization.
about.desc2: Our platform combines cutting-edge AI technology with intuitive design to make physics concepts accessible and engaging for learners of all levels, from high school students to university scholars.
about.desc3: Whether you're struggling with thermodynamics, quantum mechanics, or classical physics, TermoPhysics provides personalized guidance and visual explanations that click.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.desc: We're building an amazing team of experts in AI, physics education, and design.
team.checkBack: Check back soon to meet the talented individuals behind TermoPhysics!

cta.title: Ready to Master Physics?
cta.desc: Join thousands of students already learning with TermoPhysics. Start your journey today!

footer.brand: Learn physics with AI-powered explanations and visual illustrations.
